title: Chunky vegetable mulligatawny soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '5 potatoes, chopped in to small blocks', '1 handful baby carrots', '2 teaspoons plain flour', '2 teaspoons mild curry powder', '900ml (1 1/2 pt) vegetable or chicken stock', '6 tablespoons white or basmati rice, cooked', '1 pinch dried thyme', 'salt and pepper to taste']
